h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (Final Encounter)
content: The good news in all of this is you'll be pretty unstoppable in this mode. Your light attacks will unleash a flurry of wide sweep attacks, and your heavy strike will perform his spinning slash move.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (Final Encounter)' and the sub-subsection 'Floating Sculpture'.
The content is as follows:
The good news in all of this is you'll be pretty unstoppable in this mode. Your light attacks will unleash a flurry of wide sweep attacks, and your heavy strike will perform his spinning slash move.
